Uses of Class
net.jodah.lyra.retry.RetryPolicy

  • Packages that use RetryPolicy 
    Package Description
    net.jodah.lyra  
    net.jodah.lyra.retry  

    • Uses of RetryPolicy in net.jodah.lyra

      Methods in net.jodah.lyra that return RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryPolicy Options.getChannelRecoveryPolicy() 
      RetryPolicy Options.getChannelRetryPolicy() 
      RetryPolicy Options.getConnectionRecoveryPolicy() 
      RetryPolicy Options.getConnectionRetryPolicy() 
      RetryPolicy Options.getConnectRetryPolicy() 
      Methods in net.jodah.lyra with parameters of type RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Options Options.withChannelRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the RetryPolicy to use for the recovery of each Channel after an unexpected Connection/Channel closure.
      Options Options.withChannelRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the RetryPolicy to use for handling Channel invocation errors.
      Options Options.withConnectionRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the RetryPolicy to use for the recovery of Connections after an unexpected Connection closure.
      Options Options.withConnectionRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the RetryPolicy to use for handling Connection invocation errors.
      Options Options.withConnectRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the RetryPolicy to use for handling connection attempt errors.
      Options Options.withRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the global RetryPolicy for the recovery of Connections/Channels/Consumers after an unexpected Connection/Channel closure.
      Options Options.withRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Sets the global RetryPolicy to use for handling connection attempt, Connection invocation, and Channel invocation errors.

    • Uses of RetryPolicy in net.jodah.lyra.retry

      Methods in net.jodah.lyra.retry that return RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RetryPolicy RetryPolicies.retryAlways()
      Returns a RetryPolicy that always retries.
      static RetryPolicy RetryPolicies.retryNever()
      Returns a RetryPolicy that never retries.
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.withBackoff(Duration retryInterval, Duration maxRetryInterval)
      Sets the retryInterval to pause for, exponentially backing of to the maxRetryInterval multiplying successive intervals by a factor of 2.
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.withBackoff(Duration retryInterval, Duration maxRetryInterval, int retryIntervalMultiplier)
      Sets the retryInterval to pause for, exponentially backing of to the maxRetryInterval multiplying successive intervals by the retryIntervalMultiplier.
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.withMaxDuration(Duration maxDuration)
      Sets the max duration of the RetryPolicy.
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.withMaxRetries(int maxRetries)
      Sets the max retries to perform.
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.withRetryInterval(Duration retryInterval)
      Sets the retryInterval to pause for between retries.
